Posts.Content: DIEP Flap or Implants...How to choose? Options ‎22-01-2016 09:09 PM Hello Ladies,   I was looking to learn from your experiences on the reconstruction choices you have made.   I have just finished my chemotherapy and will now be having my surgery. As a BRCA1 gene carrier. I have opted for a double mx with immediate reconstruction. However I'm still undecided on which route to take.   my main concerns with DIEP are the long recovery time and the scar which will be hip bone to hip bone. Also what is the cosmetic result like? With implants, the higher risk of infection is a concern. Also the fact they would need to be replaced further down the line.   I'm 31 and yet to have any children, I'm also a C cup. Thank you for reading.   Naz
Posts.Title: DIEP flap or Implants... How to choose?

Posts.Content: Hi Pauline, I'm running through the same questions in my head! The medical team have explained the benefits of each. It is ultimately your decision to make, which for me, makes it that much harder! I'm sure when your time comes, you will do what is right for you. I would discuss it at length with your oncology team. Thanks. Naz
